text:
Printavo has a problem. We have printing businesses all over the world using Printavo to make it keep track of their workflow. Our team is small and we've grown as a company which has created interesting engineering challenges.

We're looking for our 2nd Engineer to join the team and create a platform of the future for the printing industry.

We're located in Chicago and our platform is built on Ruby on Rails.

Curiosity, drive and business sense are important. If you're ready for the next challenge, let's chat!

https://angel.co/printavo/jobs/260415-full-stack-engineer https://www.printavo.com
